EmailTemplate.name: 06-01-22 RET Freshop Competitive Attack 4.Email 4
EmailTemplate.subject: New eBook! Grow Your Online Grocery Revenue – Fast.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: 90 percent of eCommerce grocery consumers say they intend to keep shopping online, for good. Investing in grocery eCommerce is a must for retailers looking to stay competitive while giving customers more ways to check out. Read how new shopper habits have customers demanding a frictionless online shopping experience from start to finish—and how to deliver it. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Contact us to learn more. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/contact-us]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
